results.firPara: In todays Fiver Big Cup qualification, Robbie Savage threatens us with more than his words, an ode to Brendan and Luther Blissett loses 11-0
results.secPara: In todays Fiver Big Cup qualification, Robbie Savage threatens us with more than his words, an ode to Brendan and Luther Blissett loses 11-0
results.webTitle: The Fiver | A painting of a spitfire and a gold-embossed chain

results.firPara: After what he had described as probably the longest 90 minutes of his career, Brendan Rodgers was entitled to see the positives in Celtics nerve-shredding progress to the Champions League group stages for the first time in three years.
results.secPara: I am immensely proud, he said after his side had survived Hapoel Beer-Shevas onslaught to advance 5-4 on aggregate following a 2-0 defeat on the night. Maybe the focus of the criticism when I came in was we couldnt tough it out but we showed after two games and under a huge amount of pressure that this team could tough it out.
results.webTitle: Brendan Rodgers savours win but Celtic must plug gaps in Champions League

results.firPara: Manchester United would consider allowing Bastian Schweinsteiger to leave for free, after the German stated that they will be the last European club he plays for.
results.secPara: The 32-year-old cost United around £6m when Louis van Gaal, the former manager, signed him from Bayern Munich last summer. After a disappointing first season there is a recognition at United that if it is suitable for both parties, a transfer fee will not be requested should Schweinsteiger receive an attractive offer.
results.webTitle: Manchester United consider allowing Bastian Schweinsteiger to leave for free

results.firPara: West Ham have agreed a £5.5m fee with the Swiss club Sion for Edimilson Fernandes, with the 20-year-old midfielder set to travel to London on Wednesday for a medical.
results.secPara: Fernandes, who is a cousin of the former Manchester City player Gélson Fernandes, is a product of Sions youth system and made 26 appearances in the Swiss Super league last season, scoring one goal. He also started the Europa League group stage tie against Liverpool last October, which ended in a 1-1 draw, and the second match against Jürgen Klopps side in Switzerland in December.
results.webTitle: Edimilson Fernandes to have West Ham medical after £5.5m deal agreed

results.firPara: Featuring Tom Hanlons remarkable goals for Pollok against Neilston, the strike that helped Brazil win gold in the Olympics and a fancy flick from Los Angeles
results.secPara: Featuring Tom Hanlons remarkable goals for Pollok against Neilston, the strike that helped Brazil win gold in the Olympics and a fancy flick from Los Angeles
results.webTitle: The best goals of the week: Neymar, Lionel Messi and an astounding hat-trick

results.firPara: Watford have signed the defender Daryl Janmaat from Newcastle for £7.5m. The Holland right-back has been immediately replaced at St James Park by DeAndre Yedlin, who completed a £5m move from Tottenham Hotspur.
results.secPara: Janmaat, who joined Newcastle in July 2014 from Feyenoord, has signed a four-year contract at Vicarage Road. The 27-year-old said Im really happy to be here, its a new adventure for me. I was really pleased that Watford showed interest in me because I wanted to play in the Premier League.
results.webTitle: Watford sign full-back Daryl Janmaat from Newcastle for £7.5m

results.firPara: Plus teams with miserable League Cup records, players telling porkies about international call-ups, and a debut to remember in the Netherlands
results.secPara: Has any team had players from each of the six permanently inhabited continents (Africa, Asia, Europe, North America, South America and Oceania) at one time? tweeted Kenn Rushworth last week.
results.webTitle: Teams with players from every continent and confederation in the world

results.firPara: The midfielder decided to forego the English academy system and get an education in the US. Now he is thriving alongside Andrea Pirlo and David Villa
results.secPara: When Jack Harrison was a youngster, growing up in Bolton and playing for Manchester Uniteds youth academy, he perhaps did not imagine that football would take him to the most famous baseball stadium in the world. But football has a funny way of doing things. Which is why, on a recent summers afternoon in New York City, Harrison, 19, sat in one of the dugouts at Yankee Stadium, discussing the unconventional path – at least in of English football terms – that has taken him to the professional ranks here with New York City FC.
results.webTitle: Jack Harrison: from Manchester United to No1 draft pick and Yankee Stadium

results.firPara: With only seven days to go before the transfer window closes, we look at who the clubs have already signed and where they still need to strengthen
results.secPara: Takuma Asano, Sanfrecce Hiroshima, £3.4m; Rob Holding, Bolton, £2.5m; Kelechi Nwakali, Diamond Academy, £3m; Granit Xhaka, Borussia Mönchengladbach, £35m
results.webTitle: Transfer window: one week to go - what do every Premier League club still need?

results.firPara: The Premier League remains a purely sporting spectacle, without the need for a journey, backstory or training montage to educate us – and what a relief that is
results.secPara: Attention, football! My love for you is not conditional on you learning from the Olympics. In fact, its not conditional. Honestly, darling, youre like a child to me in that way. I will love you whatever – even when youre naughty, even when Im cross, even when it sounds like Im really disappointed in you. (It might feel confusing at the time, but in some ways those are the moments I love you the most.) In fact, I will love you even if it all gets a bit We Need To Talk About Football. Ill still come and visit you in whatever maximum-security place theyre keeping you, after whatever horrendous thing it is youve done.
results.webTitle: I love the Olympics, but at least football spares us all that learning
